alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:40PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cache and northern Rich Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garden, or near Laketown, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laketown, Bear Lake Idaho Portion, Garden City, Garden, Bear Lake, Meadowville, Pickelville, Beaver Mountain and Lakota. This includes the following highways... US Route 89 between mile markers 468 and 502. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 110 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
